name: Moroccan Kilim floor pouf
description:

name: Moroccan wool rug, Green
description:
Enhance your home’s interior with one of our hand-woven, 100% organic wool rugs. Each rug has been hand-made by women from the Berber tribes of Morocco’s Atlas Mountains. Berbers are the indigenous people of North Africa, and the bold colors and lively patterns of these rugs reflect the ceremonial and everyday life of the Berber tribes. These exceptional rugs have an authentic quality not found in their factory-made counterparts.

55" L x 36" W

name: Moroccan Kilim backpack, Red
description:
Inspired Bazaar Backpacks are handmade in Morocco by talented artisan leather craftsmen. All our bags are unique and unusual, with beautiful detail and vibrant colours. The Kilim is made from a mixture of wool and sabra silk. As every Kilim is unique no two bags are exactly the same, each has it's own individual character and personality.

13" H x 11" W
